1 #include "ros/ros.h"
2 #include <iostream>
3 
4 #include "move_base_msgs/MoveBaseGoal.h"
5 #include <move_base_msgs/MoveBaseAction.h>
6 #include <actionlib/client/simple_action_client.h>
7 
8 #include <tf/transform_datatypes.h>
9 
10 // Code von https://answers.ros.org/question/210987/sending-a-sequence-of-goals-to-move_base/ übernommen und angepasst
11 
12 typedef actionlib::SimpleActionClient<move_base_msgs::MoveBaseAction> MoveBaseClient;
13 
14 
20 int main(int argc, char** argv)
21 {
22  ros::init(argc, argv, "simple_navigation_goals");
23 
24  // read the goals defined in the yaml file (maps folder)
25  std::vector<std::vector <double>> goals;
26  goals.resize(10);
27  ros::param::get("/robot1/move_robot_runner/goal1", goals[0]);
28  ros::param::get("/robot1/move_robot_runner/goal2", goals[1]);
29  ros::param::get("/robot1/move_robot_runner/goal3", goals[2]);
30  ros::param::get("/robot1/move_robot_runner/goal4", goals[3]);
31  ros::param::get("/robot1/move_robot_runner/goal5", goals[4]);
32  ros::param::get("/robot1/move_robot_runner/goal6", goals[5]);
33  ros::param::get("/robot1/move_robot_runner/goal7", goals[6]);
34  ros::param::get("/robot1/move_robot_runner/goal8", goals[7]);
35  ros::param::get("/robot1/move_robot_runner/goal9", goals[8]);
36  ros::param::get("/robot1/move_robot_runner/goal10", goals[9]);
37 
38  //std::cout << "\n\n\ngoals: x:" << goals[0][0] << " y:" << goals[0][1] << std::endl;
39  //std::cout << "goals: x:" << goals[1][0] << " y:" << goals[1][1] << std::endl;
40  //std::cout << "goals: x:" << goals[2][0] << " y:" << goals[2][1] << "\n" << std::endl;
41 
42  //tell the action client that we want to spin a thread by default
43  MoveBaseClient ac("move_base", true);
44 
45  //wait for the action server to come up
46  while(!ac.waitForServer(ros::Duration(5.0)))
47  {
48  ROS_INFO("Waiting for the move_base action server to come up");
49  }
50 
51  move_base_msgs::MoveBaseGoal goal;
52  goal.target_pose.header.frame_id = "map";
53  goal.target_pose.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
54 
55  // fährt alle Ziele nacheinander an und beginnt dann wieder mit dem ersten
56  while(1)
57  {
58  for(int i = 0; i < goals.size(); i++ ) {
59  ros::Duration(1).sleep(); // benötigt sleep, ansonsten wird das nächste Ziel übersprungen
60  goal.target_pose.pose.position.x = goals[i][0];
61  goal.target_pose.pose.position.y = goals[i][1];
62  double yaw = goals[i][2]; // the orientation around the z-axis in radians
63  geometry_msgs::Quaternion quat = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromYaw(yaw);
64  goal.target_pose.pose.orientation = quat;
65 
66  ac.sendGoal(goal);
67  //std::cout << "\nNew goal sent " << i << ":\tx: " << goals[i][0] << "\ty: " << goals[i][1] << "\ttheta: " << goals[i][2] << std::endl;
68 
69  ac.waitForResult();
70  if(ac.getState() == actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState::SUCCEEDED)
71  {
72  ROS_INFO("Robot reached goal %d", i);
73  }else{
74  ROS_INFO("The base failed to reach the goal");
75  }
76  }
77  }
78  return 0;
79 }
